languages.text: "Конечно, Вольный Торговец. Ульфар — наш славный брат, и любой из нас с охотой умрет за него. Не тщись понять Волков, лишь рожденному на Фенрисе дано постичь суть нашей дружбы и нашей вражды".

"Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Вольный Торговец. Ульфар — наш славный брат, и любой из нас с охотой умрет за него. Не тщись понять Волков, лишь рожденному на Фенрисе дано постичь суть нашей дружбы и нашей вражды".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: «Por supuesto, Comerciante Independiente. Ulfar es nuestro glorioso hermano y cualquiera de nosotros moriría de buen grado por él. No intente entender a los Lobos, pues solo los nacidos en Fenris pueden entender la naturaleza de nuestra amistad y enemistad».
languages.original_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, Comerciante Independiente. Ulfar es nuestro glorioso hermano y cualquiera de nosotros moriría de buen grado por él. No intente entender a los Lobos, pues solo los nacidos en Fenris pueden entender la naturaleza de nuestra amistad y enemistad».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: “当然了，行商浪人。乌尔法是我们光荣的兄弟，我们之中的任何人都愿意为他而死。不要试着去理解太空野狼，只有在芬里斯出生的人，才能理解我们的友谊与仇恨的本质。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."

traits.locale_text: “当然了，行商浪人。乌尔法是我们光荣的兄弟，我们之中的任何人都愿意为他而死。不要试着去理解太空野狼，只有在芬里斯出生的人，才能理解我们的友谊与仇恨的本质。”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: 「そうだよ、自由開拓者。ウルファーは我々の名誉ある兄弟であり、みな彼の為なら喜んで死ぬだろう。ウルフを理解しようとするな。我々の友情と敵意の本質を理解できるのはフェンリスに生まれた者だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだよ、自由開拓者。ウルファーは我々の名誉ある兄弟であり、みな彼の為なら喜んで死ぬだろう。ウルフを理解しようとするな。我々の友情と敵意の本質を理解できるのはフェンリスに生まれた者だけだ」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: « Bien entendu, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ulfar est notre vaillant frère et chacun d'entre nous est prêt à mourir pour lui. Ne cherchez pas à comprendre les Wolves, seuls les natifs de Fenris peuvent saisir pleinement la nature de nos amitiés et inimitiés. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ulfar est notre vaillant frère et chacun d'entre nous est prêt à mourir pour lui. Ne cherchez pas à comprendre les Wolves, seuls les natifs de Fenris peuvent saisir pleinement la nature de nos amitiés et inimitiés. »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Natürlich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ulfar ist unser glorreicher Bruder, und jeder von uns würde bereitwillig für ihn sterben. Versucht nicht, Wölfe zu verstehen. Nur, wer auf Fenris geboren wurde, kann das Wesen unser Freund- und Feindschaften begreifen."
languages.original_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ulfar ist unser glorreicher Bruder, und jeder von uns würde bereitwillig für ihn sterben. Versucht nicht, Wölfe zu verstehen. Nur, wer auf Fenris geboren wurde, kann das Wesen unser Freund- und Feindschaften begreifen."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Olmaz olur muyuz Hür Tacir? Ulfar bizim şanlı kardeşimizdir, her birimiz onun için zevkle canımızı veririz. Kurtları anlamaya çalışma. Yalnızca Fenris'te doğan biri bizim dostluğumuzun ve husumetimizin doğasını anlayabilir."
languages.original_text: "Of course, Rogue Trader. Ulfar is our glorious brother, and any one of us would gladly die for him. Do not seek to understand Wolves, only one born on Fenris can understand the nature of our friendship and our enmity."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki Hür Tacir. Ulfar bizim şanlı kardeşimizdir, her birimiz onun için zevkle canımızı veririz. Kurtları anlamaya çalışma. Yalnızca Fenris'te doğan biri bizim dostluğumuzun ve husumetimizin doğasını anlayabilir."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
